issue.title: [Python] Support pickling DictionaryScalar
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9998](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9998). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since the `pa.array` factory function doesn't support the creation of dictionary array pickling [has not been implemented](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/python/pyarrow/tests/test_scalars.py#L554) for dictionary scalars yet.
